title: Long time problem
body: My problem is that when I'm in queue for a long period of time or after a game i will randomly have a connection error that makes it so then i have to re due my queue and i am not able to see my rankings for the game such at A+ this started in like season 5 please help thank you

replies.body:
It sounds like this issue is stemming from a poor connection to the servers. This is likely caused by a poor local network configuration, so I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address this.

Let me know if this caused any change.
